website_summaries.verdict: This fuel injector cleaner mitigates starting issues, hesitation, and stalling so you can get where you need to go quickly.
pros: Liqui Moly improves the efficiency of injectors, fuel pipes, distributors, and valves
The result is cleaner combustion, which leads to better idle quality, improved throttle response, and greater mileage
A fantastic option for engines with catalytic converters, this fuel injection cleaner helps your engine return to its factory performance
cons: If you drive a newer vehicle with low miles, you may not see any improvements at all

customer_reviews.title: Fixed Cylinder Misfire
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last July 2017 when I almost lost hope in my 2001 Nissan Nissan Frontier Crew Cab with 355,000 miles (not a mis-print). It was getting those crazy Cylinder Mis-Fires when I read about this product. As soon as I put this in via a gas fill up, I could tell the difference right away. It has ran great these past 8 months and the Service Engine Soon light that had been on since around 70,000 miles is no more. Your results may vary but this stuff is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: GoReds

customer_reviews.title: A great preventative and longevity product for those individuals that purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: A great preventative and longevity product for those individuals that purchase their vehicles and expect to last after the payments are completed. As someone who has restored several classic cars for a hobby and maintains several family vehicles as well, liquid moly is a class leader from the pick of the field.
customer_reviews.author: SAR, Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Generally this means bad injectors, bad O2 sensors
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding! I had s PO430 OBDII code error which means “the catalyst system efficiency is below the required threshold”. Generally this means bad injectors, bad O2 sensors, bad catalytic converter or some combination. All of these are expensive to repair/replace. I put Liqui Moly in a full take gas plus I changed my engine air filter. After 15 miles of driving the error code cleared itself. Excellent inexpensive repair.
customer_reviews.author: Heatwave

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I use injector cleaners every 5 thousand miles and have never had an issue, my car has 50 thousand miles. I decided to try this and it turned on my check engine light after about 10 minutes of driving. DO NOT USE FOR TURBO GDI ENGINES, this product has very little information on the bottle and no has warning information, it does not say o2 sensor or catalytic converter safe so there is that as well
customer_reviews.author: Russell p

customer_reviews.title: WOW BMW E90 this the best fuel injection cleaner I ever have
customer_reviews.text: WOW BMW E90 this the best fuel injection cleaner I ever have . I normally use Lucas Oil injection cleaner and i was 2 or 3 years nothing feel different . But after I switch to Liqui Moly Jectron , OMG bring back all power losing 2or 3 yrs ago. This is the best Injection cleaner .
customer_reviews.author: raksasok

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it worked?
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't tell much of a difference to be honest. I've used other cleaners that allowed me to feel a difference almost immediately. I've driven 400 miles hoping something would happen- no difference. But maybe it works on other cars? I just won't be purchasing again in the future unless I'm convinced with something with results. It did arrive in the mail quicker than I anticipated and the funnel attached saved me some time from cleaning my old funnel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Already bought more.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff worked great. In trying to troubleshoot a loss of power issue with my f150, this helped tremendously. The fuel milage went from 12c/17h to 15c/21h. I normally do a fuel treatment at every oil change, which I roughly do every 4-6k miles, and this is the first time i've seen noticeable results. I'll be switching to this going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Liqui Moly jectron injector cleaner. Ooh yes!!
customer_reviews.text: Oooooh yes. This stuff is for real. I put a can in while filling up with gas. I left the engine running on purpose to see if a difference would be made quickly. I could hear a difference when this injector cleaner hit the combustion chambers. When taking off from the gas station I noticed a quick acceleration as like a new ride. My car has 107,403 miles on it. The service engine light came on briefly then went off. No problems. Just quick acceleration and smooth idling. I will be adding a can about every couple of months just to keep things tip top. I use nothing but 93 octane in my ride. This stuff works!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Powerful fuel injector cleaner. Safe for K-Jetronic Fuel systems!
customer_reviews.text: I added this to a 13 gallon tank of 93 octane in my 82 Delorean for some upkeep on the fuel injection system. From what I read, it’s safe to use with the K-Jetrontic fuel injection systems which is what the Delorean has. Noticed a difference in the idle and response after about 3 gallons of fuel ran through it. I highly recommend Jectron. It’s a high quality additive. My only complaint is the inner seal was slightly leaking upon arrival. If it was leaking any more, it would of leaked into the box. The little funnel is very useful for pretty much every car.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Burdess

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2002 gmc envoy with 150000 plus miles on it . I noticed a slight bog at idle with my a/c running and as I live in Louisiana I aint turning it off in July no way . I do keep my vehicle in good mechanical shape plus I put lucas gas treatment in religiously but I have heard of this product before and decided to try it before tearing into my injectors . this stuff is great cleared up the bog and it feels like I have gained some lost horse power I like the results so much I order two more cans it works great
customer_reviews.author: Avenger

customer_reviews.title: Liquid tune-up, but like, for real.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Mini Cooper S with 105k on it. I’ve tried other fuel injections and literally noticed no difference in performance. Thankfully, I stumbled across this brand and after reading, realized that it’s a preferred product of owners of bmw/mini. I’m definitely not being compensated for this review, but honestly, spend the $10 bucks and you won’t regret it, especially if you own a BMW or Mini. A liquid tune-up. Make sure to add it at the gas pump BEFORE you fill up. Apparently this way is the most effective way to use the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Chilstrom

customer_reviews.title: Smoothed out rough  idle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my 04 jeep with the 4.0 liter engine. It was starting to idle rough, and would surge a bit while stopped at red lights and stop signs. I put this bottle in on a 1/4 tank and filled it to half with premium and ran it for about 60 miles. Two weeks later it is idling great, pickup seems to be a bit crisper and back to using regular grade fuel it seems to have a bit more power.
customer_reviews.author: Claus

customer_reviews.title: Not really like it says
customer_reviews.text: My truck has 160k miles on it, and I've been taking great care of it ever since I got it, there's a chance that my fuel injectors weren't THAT dirty. There definitely wasn't a difference with the first use. I bought 2 more after that to really make sure it had a chance to work. And to be honest, there may have been a placebo effect with the product working. I thought that there was a difference, but for such little effect, I dont think this worked for my truck. Its possible it would work you, but there's only one way to tell. I'd say give it a try, its pretty cheap so its not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Do Anything For Me
customer_reviews.text: I tried this in my Tiguan at about 80K after my MPG started going down. I put it in with half a tank like instructions I've seen. That half tank and another tank later, I didn't see any change. I'm not saying it won't work. I'm just saying it didn't work for me. My car has a turbo engine, so I only put 93 octane in it. Maybe the injectors were never clogged.
customer_reviews.author: MrTripps

customer_reviews.title: Liqui Moly is head to head with Lucas with their ...
customer_reviews.text: Liqui Moly is head to head with Lucas with their fuel injection maintenance products. I have to get both just so I know I'm putting equal amounts of greatness in my car.
customer_reviews.author: TakeKare

customer_reviews.title: No difference s
customer_reviews.text: I used this product in my motorcycle and then I purchased it again and I used it in my car I can't say I noticed any difference in any way at all. Either in miles per gallon or how the vehicle ran during or after using this. I'm open to the possibility that maybe my vehicle just didn't need cleaned in the first place. In the past I would use a product called seafoam and I would usually feel a difference
customer_reviews.author: VisionRider

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: Put it in after my oil change and gave me 2 more miles per gallon for a few months according to my vehicles digital display center.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Stopped my truck from a rough idle and sputtering on start up.
customer_reviews.text: My truck was sputtering from a rough idle on starting it up sometimes but my mechanic said I didn't need a tune up. So I tried this product and I could tell the difference right away. I will order this again.
customer_reviews.author: dr_d90

customer_reviews.title: No difference
customer_reviews.text: Put this in my car because of dirty injectors. No difference at all. Replaced the injectors and then I saw a difference. Don’t be fooled.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Aguiar

customer_reviews.title: Liqui Moly makes great products.
customer_reviews.text: Liqui moly makes great stuff. I did not notice huge gains in mileage or power increase, however I was not expecting this to do those things. I used this with realistic expectations as a fuel system treatment to keep things working well. I have every confidence that this will keep my fuel system in good shape. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Boeck

customer_reviews.title: DId not resolve my issue
customer_reviews.text: I think it worked but did not see any mileage increase and my hesitation issue still remains. So I can not provide a full review. Great can with a funnel which made it easier
customer_reviews.author: JStyl

customer_reviews.title: Didn't see much difference, if any.
customer_reviews.text: I added this into the gas tank of my 1994 Acura Intergra. I assume it cleaned the fuel injectors. But, I didn't notice any difference in performance. When I tried Redline SI-1 fuel additive, that is when I noticed an absolute difference in peformance AND fuel economy. I won't be buying this product again. But, I highly recommend Redline SI-1 fuel additive.
customer_reviews.author: zon_Buyer

customer_reviews.title: A Start/stop dream
customer_reviews.text: 13' BMW 335i My car has auto start and stop and has been jolting to start at stop lights for the last month. Wanted a product that'll make it smooth again. Found this and added it to a 1/4 tank. Drove it for a day with no real difference. 2nd day, major difference. Real smooth to start and stop.
customer_reviews.author: donte f.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if this did anything but at least I feel positive
customer_reviews.text: Almost all of gas cleaners and additives are difficult to notice a result when using them especially when your car is already in good working condition. I used this in my 2007 Corolla S and not sure if it made any impact but I'm hoping it cleaned something on the way!
customer_reviews.author: Jaff

customer_reviews.title: Great for older engines
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I can recommend more than this product is to clean your sensors after using it. I had so much carbon build up on the plugs and sensors after using this stuff, it clearly does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Use it regularly
customer_reviews.text: I honestly have no idea if this is working or not, but, I use it as recommended in both my SUV and my sedan. It is super simple to open and pour in my gas tank (after filling it). It makes me feel better thinking that I'm keeping my cars in the best possible condition and hopefully avoiding an expensive service down the road.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly in my vehicles
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product out on my 08 Honda and solved my misfire issues Due to dirty injectors. Also added to my 02 Highlander and solved my missing problem and rough idling. I heard bad reviews and good reviews. I have been using for some time now and worked perfectly for me. I will continue to use as needed. Will recommend to others. Great products and far better than other products.
customer_reviews.author: CancerDAD

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be an improvement
customer_reviews.text: It's very hard to tell if this works, because any difference you feel in power will be minimal. That's complicated by the fact that I also just got new plugs and wires. However, I do feel that my vehicle is running smoother and has slightly more acceleration than before I used it. I don't see how it can hurt. Give it a shot and see if you notice a difference.
customer_reviews.author: bek

customer_reviews.title: Veey good product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Yamaha R6 and will be a returning customer for life. I had a rough idle issue and within the first 20 miles after adding this to my gas tank, the problem was fixed. The bike runs smoother, idles better, and has noticeably better performance .
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tried this in my classic Mercedes and it worked so well I sold it. The car I mean.
customer_reviews.author: Warren W. Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Love Liqui Moly
customer_reviews.text: Add to a full tank, and about 1/2 way through tank of gas... man is my car running smooth and great!! I add it every oil change... improves performance and mileage..... note: I drive a 2004 BMW 325i with 92,000 miles on it.... I use several of their products, check them out!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Not just another snake oil!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I went from a somewhat rough idle to a smooth idle and from 24 mpg compined to about 27.5 mpg combined. Used a second time just for better piece of mind and noticed what seemed to be a slight increase in throttle response, could just be on my head though.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Cant say if this item did all the excellent job. But with the combination of this brand ...
customer_reviews.text: Cant say if this item did all the excellent job. But with the combination of this brand products ( engine flush, anti friction, valve clean, injection cleaner) and Castrol EDGE 5w20 + Bosch oil filter my Elantra 2012 become: quietly, rough idling gone, more power at low rpm, increased mpg and smoother run!
customer_reviews.author: Boris Portnoi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, my newphew is senior mechanic with mercedes and states for it to work with cleaning rails must be used at least four times to see best resukts
customer_reviews.author: joe w

customer_reviews.title: I've used Techron, Stabil 360, Seafoam and B-12 ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used Techron, Stabil 360, Seafoam and B-12. Surprisingly this one gave me a few more miles to the gallon on my 2011 Honda CRV.
customer_reviews.author: dtd3cebu

customer_reviews.title: God's car juice
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 10 stars I would. I drive a 2018 Civic hatchback. And lately I've been having trouble with stuttering on acceleration. These DI motors are pretty prove to carbon build up. I tried bg 44k with little success. Dropped in a can of this stuff. Problem disappeared. Gift from God haha. Great stuff will order again
customer_reviews.author: john owen

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value and performance.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. It delivers trust me when I say that. Added this to a 2008 Prius With just over115k miles. Gained 3 miles per gallon and any speeds where I am cruising without pushing the gas peddle, I cannot hear any engine noise. This is amazing. Only thing I need to see is how long with this last. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Fuel Additive on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: After using a plethora of fule dditives over the years, I've seen only marginal performance increases. After one bottle pf Moly, my HP has increased 10-15% and my mileage is up almost 20%. Great product at a great price!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Blakester

customer_reviews.title: Just plain excellent
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with Liqui-Moly (or pretty much any German car treatment product, for that matter). You'll notice the improvement right away. Depending on how many miles are on your engine, you may want or need to use this more often than the recommended 3k or so.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: lower idle, smoother running
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work, I've used it on several cars regularly and they seem to run better after. Lower idle, smoother running etc. May have more to do with the oil change, dunno.
customer_reviews.author: Thor1964

customer_reviews.title: Waste of 10 bucks
customer_reviews.text: Did jack crap for me. Tried putting it in an almost empty tank and a tank with 6 gallons. No bueno both times.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend Liqui Moly Jectron.
customer_reviews.text: Liquid Moly Jectron gasoline is a great product to use for cleaning the fuel system . I always use it for my 2013 vw passat . The difference is noticable after using it . Better then any other crap claiming to “ clean the fuel system “.
customer_reviews.author: Dritan Pelivani

customer_reviews.title: didn't notice and diffence in performance
customer_reviews.text: Didn't notice any difference in performance. Wouldn't buy them again.

customer_reviews.title: OMG IT WORKS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg this stuff WORKS. I got my MPG back on my 2017 honda accord!!! YEASS

customer_reviews.text: I filled my Saturn,Buick and KIA Sportage EX tanks full of gasoline with this..After driving half a tank of fuel my mileage,response and idle are improved..

customer_reviews.title: but my car totally reversed to better mileage. I kid you not
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, I did not believe it. I bought this product thinking that I'd be wasting my money, but my car totally reversed to better mileage. I kid you not, this is a great product. I'll definitely will buy it again.

customer_reviews.text: I added this to my 2007 Nissan Altima and the gas mileage has improved as well as the performance. I'm a believer in this product and will be buying more!

customer_reviews.title: the best fuel injector cleaner out there
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, the best fuel injector cleaner out there. It really works-it was first recommended to me by a very excellent mechanic and I have been using it regularly for many years. I have never had to replace an injector yet.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Hard to tell exactly the cleaning power without examining valves and injection ports, but this product does seem to make and keep engine run quite smoothly.

customer_reviews.title: Increase fuel economy!
customer_reviews.text: 2014 jeep wrangler, 37s, 6 inch lift. Mpg went from 16 to 19 after 50 miles of driving. Will buy again, and so far best additive I have ever used.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is the best fuel additive I've used. I've always used sea foam, but have this a try after reading the reviews. Sea foam works really well, but I think this is just a little bit better. I definitely noticed a difference after using this in my car.
customer_reviews.author: gjh

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Yep it works
customer_reviews.text: This seems to give my 06 Impreza with 116k miles on it a lot more power and seems gas mileage has gone way up! Car was not super neglected either! WAY better than seafoam and lucas etc. without a doubt!

customer_reviews.title: it works !

product_meta.title: Liqui Moly 2007 Jectron Gasoline Fuel Injection Cleaner - 300 ml
product_meta.description: Size:300 MilliliterCleans contaminated petrol injection systems, removes carbon deposits and deposits from fuel pipes, fuel distributors, injection and inlet valves; therefore, no starting problems and no lean surging, smoother idling, good throttle response, low-pollution, and environmentally compatible combustion. Promotes accurate injector dosing and fuel atomization: Your engine regains its original performance. Fuel consumption is reduced. Especially suitable for engines with catalytic converters.
feature_bullets: Eliminates starting problems, hesitation and stalling
